symptoms: Door snaps closed on user's hand
attempted_steps: Wizard asked if door snaps shut suddenly from a small push or only with more force
suspected_causes: Door latch or spring might be too strong or misaligned
warnings: Be cautious to avoid injury with door snapping shut
notes: User describes dishwasher door snapping shut on hand, causing a 'biting' sensation. Wizard suspects mechanical issue with door latch or spring, but no fix confirmed yet.
